        Description copied from interface: TaskCreator
        Generate a callable that can be executed to conduct the training of this model (given the model configuration)
        Specified by:
        create in interface TaskCreator
        Parameters:
        candidate - Candidate (model) configuration to be trained
        dataProvider - DataProvider, for the data
        scoreFunction - Score function to be used to evaluate the model
        statusListener - Status listeners, that can be used for callbacks (to UI, for example)
        Returns:
        A callable that returns an OptimizationResult, once optimization is complete
